text: bhadramaya keattakaleatukutiya pattanannalil veccea vanmatilukalkku pirake oliccirunnea allate avarearikkalum onnayi ninnaleat yud'dham ceyyukayilla. avarkkitayil parasparapear atiruksamatre. avar orrakkettanenn ni karutunnu. ennal avarute manas'sukal palatan. karanam, avar karyam sariyanvidham manas'silakkattavaranennatutanne
